column4: How do I save changes to preferences I make in compiz-config settings manager?  I changed some keybindings for scale and the old ones are still active and the new ones aren't
it's related to the recent ubuntu upgrade of compiz packages (was working fine before the upgrade), so I thought that this would be a more appropriate place
I'm not saying it is not , I don'T know anything about compiz so I am directing you to their channel
